entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Granby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Granby 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
